extendedInfo.description: This is a simple and easy-to-use tool that convert from dollar/gallon to dollar/litre, and vice versa. This application also provides the conversion between gallon and litre. It is useful when travelling across Canada/USA border, and you could know how expensive - or cheap - the gas price is comparing to your home.The default setting converts dollar/gallon to dollar/litre, and gallon to litre. If you want to reverse the converting direction, simply press the "Reverse" button.This version 2.0 will fetch exchange rate online (if possible), and automatically set price to  US$/Gallon and CA$/Litre, and show the exchange rate at bottom left corner. If cell phone could not access online, the exchange ratio will be set as: Default  1.00US$ = 1.00 CA$.

reviews.title: Simple and quick bragging rights
reviews.comment: Especially when you tell Canadian friends what you paid per litre. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: It\'s almost exactly everything I\'m looking for. I love the simplicity and basic usage.   This is not a criticism but couple of things I would love to see in future versions. Cost differential between CAN and US so at a glance I see how many dollars I\'m saving.  I would also love to keep a history of transactions.  This would save me from having to go outside the app to use calculator and spreadsheet.    I would easily pay for this app especially if it had these features.
reviews.author: Dan Lessard

reviews.title: works perfect
reviews.comment: does exactly what i want. thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Simple and didn\'t attempt to steal my contact list, like other free apps.
reviews.author: Martin P.

reviews.title: good tool
reviews.comment: easy to use. now I know how much gas is CA$/liter in America.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just what I need. excellent app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and to the point
reviews.comment: A simple suggestion for the next version is to enable the keyboard by default when you open the app. Otherwise very simple and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Simple and this is all you need.
reviews.author: Francis Belanger

reviews.title: Simple. Works.
reviews.comment: Great example of a nice simple app that simply works (well).
reviews.author: A Google User
